00005 package require Tk
00006 package provide ctext 4.0
00007 
00008 namespace eval ctext {
00009   array set REs {
00010     words  {([^\s\(\{\[\}\]\)\.\t\n\r;:=\"'\|,<>]+)}
00011   }
00012 }
00013 
00014 #win is used as a unique token to create arrays for each ctext instance
00015 proc ctext::getAr {win suffix name} {
00016   set arName __ctext[set win][set suffix]
00017   uplevel [list upvar \#0 $arName $name]
00018   return $arName
00019 }
00020 
00021 proc ctext {win args} {
00022   if {[llength $args] & 1} {
00023     return -code error \
00024     "invalid number of arguments given to ctext (uneven number after window) : $args"
00025   }
00026 
00027   frame $win -class Ctext -padx 1 -pady 1
00028 
00029   set tmp [text .__ctextTemp]
00030 
00031   ctext::getAr $win config ar
00032 
00033   set ar(-fg)                    [$tmp cget -foreground]
00034   set ar(-bg)                    [$tmp cget -background]
00035   set ar(-font)                  [$tmp cget -font]
00036   set ar(-relief)                [$tmp cget -relief]
00037   set ar(-unhighlightcolor)      [$win cget -bg]
00038   destroy $tmp
00039   set ar(-xscrollcommand)        ""
00040   set ar(-yscrollcommand)        ""
00041   set ar(-highlightcolor)        "yellow"
00042   set ar(-linemap)               1
00043   set ar(-linemapfg)             $ar(-fg)
00044   set ar(-linemapbg)             $ar(-bg)
00045   set ar(-linemap_mark_command)  {}
00046   set ar(-linemap_markable)      1
00047   set ar(-linemap_show_current)  1
00048   set ar(-linemap_select_fg)     black
00049   set ar(-linemap_select_bg)     yellow
00050   set ar(-linemap_cursor)        left_ptr
00051   set ar(-linemap_relief)        $ar(-relief)
00052   set ar(-linemap_minwidth)      1
00053   set ar(-highlight)             1
00054   set ar(-warnwidth)             ""
00055   set ar(-warnwidth_bg)          red
00056   set ar(-casesensitive)         1
00057   set ar(-peer)                  ""
00058   set ar(re_opts)                ""
00059   set ar(win)                    $win
00060   set ar(modified)               0
00061   set ar(commentsAfterId)        ""
00062   set ar(blinkAfterId)           ""
00063   set ar(lastUpdate)             0
00064   set ar(block_comment_patterns) [list]
00065   set ar(string_patterns)        [list]
00066   set ar(line_comment_patterns)  [list]
00067   set ar(comment_re)             ""
00068   set ar(gutters)                [list]
00069 
00070   set ar(ctextFlags) [list -xscrollcommand -yscrollcommand -linemap -linemapfg -linemapbg \
00071   -font -linemap_mark_command -highlight -warnwidth -warnwidth_bg -linemap_markable \
00072   -linemap_show_current -linemap_cursor -highlightcolor \
00073   -linemap_select_fg -linemap_select_bg -linemap_relief -linemap_minwidth -casesensitive -peer]
00074 
00075   array set ar $args
00076 
00077   foreach flag {foreground background} short {fg bg} {
00078     if {[info exists ar(-$flag)] == 1} {
00079       set ar(-$short) $ar(-$flag)
00080       unset ar(-$flag)
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00084   # Now remove flags that will confuse text and those that need
00085   # modification:
00086   foreach arg $ar(ctextFlags) {
00087     if {[set loc [lsearch $args $arg]] >= 0} {
00088       set args [lreplace $args $loc [expr {$loc + 1}]]
00089     }
00090   }
00091 
00092   # Initialize the starting linemap ID
00093   ctext::getAr $win linemap linemapAr
00094   set linemapAr(id) 0
00095 
00096   text $win.l -font $ar(-font) -width $ar(-linemap_minwidth) -height 1 \
00097     -relief $ar(-relief) -bd 0 -fg $ar(-linemapfg) -cursor $ar(-linemap_cursor) \
00098     -bg $ar(-linemapbg) -takefocus 0 -highlightthickness 0
00099   frame $win.f -width 1 -bd 0 -relief flat -bg $ar(-warnwidth_bg)
00100 
00101   set topWin [winfo toplevel $win]
00102   bindtags $win.l [list $win.l $topWin all]
00103 
00104   if {$ar(-linemap) == 1} {
00105     grid $win.l -sticky ns -row 0 -column 0
00106     grid $win.f -sticky ns -row 0 -column 1
00107   }
00108 
00109   set args [concat $args [list -yscrollcommand [list ctext::event:yscroll $win $ar(-yscrollcommand)]] \
00110                          [list -xscrollcommand [list ctext::event:xscroll $win $ar(-xscrollcommand)]]]
00111 
00112   #escape $win, because it could have a space
00113   if {$ar(-peer) eq ""} {
00114     text $win.t -font $ar(-font) -bd 0 -highlightthickness 0 {*}$args
00115   } else {
00116     # TBD - We should probably verify that -peer is a ctext widget path
00117     $ar(-peer)._t peer create $win.t -font $ar(-font) -bd 0 -highlightthickness 0 {*}$args
00118   }
00119 
00120   frame $win.t.w -width 1 -bd 0 -relief flat -bg $ar(-warnwidth_bg)
00121 
00122   if {$ar(-warnwidth) ne ""} {
00123     place $win.t.w -x [font measure [$win.t cget -font] -displayof . [string repeat "m" $ar(-warnwidth)]] -relheight 1.0
00124   }
00125 
00126   grid $win.t -row 0 -column 2 -sticky news
00127   grid rowconfigure    $win 0 -weight 100
00128   grid columnconfigure $win 2 -weight 100
00129 
00130   bind $win.t <Configure>         [list ctext::linemapUpdate $win]
00131   bind $win.l <ButtonPress-1>     [list ctext::linemapToggleMark $win %y]
00132   bind $win.t <KeyRelease-Return> [list ctext::linemapUpdate $win]
00133   bind $win.t <FocusIn>           [list ctext::handleFocusIn $win]
00134   bind $win.t <FocusOut>          [list ctext::handleFocusOut $win]
00135   rename $win __ctextJunk$win
00136   rename $win.t $win._t
00137 
00138   bind $win <Destroy> [list ctext::event:Destroy $win %W]
00139   bindtags $win.t [linsert [bindtags $win.t] 0 $win]
00140 
00141   interp alias {} $win {} ctext::instanceCmd $win
00142   interp alias {} $win.t {} $win
00143 
00144   ctext::modified $win 0
00145   ctext::buildArgParseTable $win
00146 
00147   return $win
00148 }
00149 
00150 proc ctext::event:xscroll {win clientData args} {
00151 
00152   if {$clientData == ""} {
00153     return
00154   }
00155 
00156   uplevel \#0 $clientData $args
00157 
00158   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00159 
00160   lassign $args first last
00161 
00162   if {$first > 0} {
00163     set first_line [lindex [split [$win.t index @0,0] .] 0]
00164     set last_line  [lindex [split [$win.t index @0,[winfo height $win.t]] .] 0]
00165     set longest    0
00166     for {set i $first_line} {$i <= $last_line} {incr i} {
00167       if {[set len [lindex [split [$win.t index $i.end] .] 1]] > $longest} {
00168         set longest $len
00169       }
00170     }
00171     set missing [expr round( ($longest * 7) * $first )]
00172   } else {
00173     set missing 0
00174   }
00175 
00176   # Width is calculated by multiplying the longest line with the length of a single character
00177   set newx [expr ($configAr(-warnwidth) * 7) - $missing]
00178 
00179   # Move the vertical bar
00180   place $win.t.w -x $newx -relheight 1.0
00181 
00182 }
00183 
00184 proc ctext::event:yscroll {win clientData args} {
00185   ctext::linemapUpdate $win
00186 
00187   if {$clientData == ""} {
00188     return
00189   }
00190   uplevel \#0 $clientData $args
00191 }
00192 
00193 proc ctext::event:Destroy {win dWin} {
00194   if {![string equal $win $dWin]} {
00195     return
00196   }
00197 
00198   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00199 
00200   catch {after cancel $configAr(commentsAfterId)}
00201   catch {after cancel $configAr(blinkAfterId)}
00202 
00203   bgproc::killall ctext::*
00204 
00205   catch {rename $win {}}
00206   interp alias {} $win.t {}
00207   ctext::clearHighlightClasses $win
00208   array unset [ctext::getAr $win config ar]
00209 }

00211 # This stores the arg table within the config array for each instance.
00212 # It's used by the configure instance command.
00213 proc ctext::buildArgParseTable win {
00214   set argTable [list]
00215 
00216   lappend argTable any -linemap_mark_command {
00217     set configAr(-linemap_mark_command) $value
00218     break
00219   }
00220 
00221   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -linemap {
00222     grid $self.l -sticky ns -row 0 -column 0
00223     grid columnconfigure $self 0 \
00224     -minsize [winfo reqwidth $self.l]
00225     set configAr(-linemap) 1
00226     break
00227   }
00228 
00229   lappend argTable {0 false no} -linemap {
00230     grid forget $self.l
00231     grid columnconfigure $self 0 -minsize 0
00232     set configAr(-linemap) 0
00233     break
00234   }
00235 
00236   lappend argTable any -xscrollcommand {
00237     set cmd [list $self._t config -xscrollcommand \
00238     [list ctext::event:xscroll $self $value]]
00239 
00240     if {[catch $cmd res]} {
00241       return $res
00242     }
00243     set configAr(-xscrollcommand) $value
00244     break
00245   }
00246 
00247   lappend argTable any -yscrollcommand {
00248     set cmd [list $self._t config -yscrollcommand \
00249     [list ctext::event:yscroll $self $value]]
00250 
00251     if {[catch $cmd res]} {
00252       return $res
00253     }
00254     set configAr(-yscrollcommand) $value
00255     break
00256   }
00257 
00258   lappend argTable any -linemapfg {
00259     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00260       return -code error $res
00261     }
00262     $self.l config -fg $value
00263     set configAr(-linemapfg) $value
00264     break
00265   }
00266 
00267   lappend argTable any -linemapbg {
00268     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00269       return -code error $res
00270     }
00271     $self.l config -bg $value
00272     set configAr(-linemapbg) $value
00273     break
00274   }
00275 
00276   lappend argTable any -linemap_relief {
00277     if {[catch {$self.l config -relief $value} res]} {
00278       return -code error $res
00279     }
00280     set configAr(-linemap_relief) $value
00281     break
00282   }
00283 
00284   lappend argTable any -font {
00285     if {[catch {$self.l config -font $value} res]} {
00286       return -code error $res
00287     }
00288     $self._t config -font $value
00289     set configAr(-font) $value
00290     break
00291   }
00292 
00293   lappend argTable {0 false no} -highlight {
00294     set configAr(-highlight) 0
00295     break
00296   }
00297 
00298   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -highlight {
00299     set configAr(-highlight) 1
00300     break
00301   }
00302 
00303   lappend argTable any -warnwidth {
00304     set configAr(-warnwidth) $value
00305     if {$value eq ""} {
00306       place forget $self.t.w
00307     } else {
00308       place $self.t.w -x [font measure [$self.t cget -font] -displayof . [string repeat "m" $value]] -relheight 1.0
00309     }
00310     break
00311   }
00312 
00313   lappend argTable any -warnwidth_bg {
00314     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00315       return -code error $res
00316     }
00317     set configAr(-warnwidth_bg) $value
00318     $self.t.w configure -bg $value
00319     $self.f   configure -bg $value
00320     break
00321   }
00322 
00323   lappend argTable any -highlightcolor {
00324     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00325       return -code error $res
00326     }
00327     set configAr(-highlightcolor) $value
00328     break
00329   }
00330 
00331   lappend argTable {0 false no} -linemap_markable {
00332     set configAr(-linemap_markable) 0
00333     break
00334   }
00335 
00336   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -linemap_markable {
00337     set configAr(-linemap_markable) 1
00338     break
00339   }
00340 
00341   lappend argTable {0 false no} -linemap_show_current {
00342     set configAr(-linemap_show_current) 0
00343     break
00344   }
00345 
00346   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -linemap_show_current {
00347     set configAr(-linemap_show_current) 1
00348     break
00349   }
00350 
00351   lappend argTable any -linemap_select_fg {
00352     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00353       return -code error $res
00354     }
00355     set configAr(-linemap_select_fg) $value
00356     $self.l tag configure lmark -foreground $value
00357     break
00358   }
00359 
00360   lappend argTable any -linemap_select_bg {
00361     if {[catch {winfo rgb $self $value} res]} {
00362       return -code error $res
00363     }
00364     set configAr(-linemap_select_bg) $value
00365     $self.l tag configure lmark -background $value
00366     break
00367   }
00368 
00369   lappend argTable {0 false no} -casesensitive {
00370     set configAr(-casesensitive) 0
00371     set configAr(re_opts) "-nocase"
00372     break
00373   }
00374 
00375   lappend argTable {1 true yes} -casesensitive {
00376     set configAr(-casesensitive) 1
00377     set configAr(re_opts) ""
00378     break
00379   }
00380 
00381   lappend argTable {any} -linemap_minwidth {
00382     if {![string is integer $value]} {
00383       return -code error "-linemap_minwidth argument must be an integer value"
00384     }
00385     if {[$self.l cget -width] < $value} {
00386       $self.l configure -width $value
00387     }
00388     set configAr(-linemap_minwidth) $value
00389     break
00390   }
00391 
00392   ctext::getAr $win config ar
00393   set ar(argTable) $argTable
00394 }

00396 proc ctext::setCommentRE {win} {
00397 
00398   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00399 
00400   set commentRE {\\}
00401   array set chars {}
00402 
00403   set patterns [concat [eval concat $configAr(block_comment_patterns)] $configAr(line_comment_patterns) $configAr(string_patterns)]
00404 
00405   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
00406     append commentRE "|" [join $patterns |]
00407 #    foreach pattern $patterns {
00408 #      if {[string index $pattern 0] ne "^"} {
00409 #        append commentRE "|" {\\} $pattern
00410 #      }
00411 #    }
00412   }
00413 
00414   set bcomments [list]
00415   set ecomments [list]
00416   foreach block $configAr(block_comment_patterns) {
00417     lappend bcomments [lindex $block 0]
00418     lappend ecomments [lindex $block 1]
00419   }
00420 
00421   set configAr(comment_re)  $commentRE
00422   set configAr(bcomment_re) [join $bcomments |]
00423   set configAr(ecomment_re) [join $ecomments |]
00424   set configAr(lcomment_re) [join $configAr(line_comment_patterns) |]
00425 
00426 }
00427 
00428 proc ctext::inCommentString {win index} {
00429   set prev_in [expr [lsearch -regexp [$win tag names $index-1c] {_([cl]Comment|[sdt]String)}] != -1]
00430   set curr_in [expr [lsearch -regexp [$win tag names $index]    {_([cl]Comment|[sdt]String)}] != -1]
00431   return [expr $curr_in && $prev_in]
00432 }
00433 
00434 proc ctext::commentsAfterIdle {win start end block} {
00435   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00436 
00437   if {"" eq $configAr(commentsAfterId)} {
00438     set configAr(commentsAfterId) [after idle \
00439     [list ctext::comments $win $start $end $block [set afterTriggered 1]]]
00440   }
00441 }

00443 proc ctext::highlight {win lineStart lineEnd} {
00444 
00445   highlightAfterIdle $win [$win index $lineStart] [$win index $lineEnd]
00446 
00447 }
00448 
00449 proc ctext::highlightAfterIdle {win lineStart lineEnd} {
00450 
00451   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
00452 
00453   # If highlighting has been disabled, return immediately
00454   if {!$configAr(-highlight)} {
00455     return
00456   }
00457 
00458   # Set the lineChanged tag on all lines to highlight
00459   set currRow [lindex [split $lineStart .] 0]
00460   set lastRow [lindex [split $lineEnd .] 0]
00461   while {1} {
00462     $win tag add lineChanged $currRow.0 $currRow.end
00463     if {[incr currRow] > $lastRow} {
00464       break
00465     }
00466   }
00467 
00468   # Perform the highlight in the background
00469   bgproc::command ctext::highlightAfterIdle$win "ctext::doHighlight $win" -cancelable 1
00470 
00471 }

00477   __ctextJunk$win configure -bg $configAr(-highlightcolor)

00479 }

00481 proc ctext::handleFocusOut {win} {

00486 
00487 }

00489 # Returns 1 if the character at the given index is escaped; otherwise, returns 0.
00490 proc ctext::isEscaped {win index} {
00491 
00492   if {[regexp {^(\\*)} [string reverse [$win get "$index linestart" $index]] -> escapes]} {
00493     return [expr [string length $escapes] % 2]
00494   }
00495 
00496   return 0
00497 
00498 }
00499 
00500 proc ctext::instanceCmd {self cmd args} {
00501 
00502   #slightly different than the RE used in ctext::comments
00503   ctext::getAr $self config configAr
00504 
00505   # Create comment RE
00506   set commentRE $configAr(comment_re)
00507 
00508   switch -glob -- $cmd {
00509     append {
00510       if {[catch {$self._t get sel.first sel.last} data] == 0} {
00511         clipboard append -displayof $self $data
00512       }
00513     }
00514 
00515     cget {
00516       set arg [lindex $args 0]
00517       ctext::getAr $self config configAr
00518 
00519       foreach flag $configAr(ctextFlags) {
00520         if {[string match ${arg}* $flag]} {
00521           return [set configAr($flag)]
00522         }
00523       }
00524       return [$self._t cget $arg]
00525     }
00526 
00527     conf* {
00528       ctext::getAr $self config configAr
00529 
00530       if {0 == [llength $args]} {
00531         set res [$self._t configure]
00532         foreach opt [list -xscrollcommand* -yscrollcommand*] {
00533           set del [lsearch -glob $res $opt]
00534           set res [lreplace $res $del $del]
00535         }
00536         foreach flag $configAr(ctextFlags) {
00537           lappend res [list $flag [set configAr($flag)]]
00538         }
00539         return $res
00540       }
00541 
00542       array set flags {}
00543       foreach flag $configAr(ctextFlags) {
00544         set loc [lsearch $args $flag]
00545         if {$loc < 0} {
00546           continue
00547         }
00548 
00549         if {[llength $args] <= ($loc + 1)} {
00550           #.t config -flag
00551           return [set configAr($flag)]
00552         }
00553 
00554         set flagArg [lindex $args [expr {$loc + 1}]]
00555         set args [lreplace $args $loc [expr {$loc + 1}]]
00556         set flags($flag) $flagArg
00557       }
00558 
00559       foreach {valueList flag cmd} $configAr(argTable) {
00560         if {[info exists flags($flag)]} {
00561           foreach valueToCheckFor $valueList {
00562             set value [set flags($flag)]
00563             if {[string equal "any" $valueToCheckFor]} $cmd \
00564             elseif {[string equal $valueToCheckFor [set flags($flag)]]} $cmd
00565           }
00566         }
00567       }
00568 
00569       if {[llength $args]} {
00570         #we take care of configure without args at the top of this branch
00571         uplevel 1 [linsert $args 0 $self._t configure]
00572       }
00573     }
00574 
00575     copy {
00576       tk_textCopy $self
00577     }
00578 
00579     cut {
00580       if {[catch {$self.t get sel.first sel.last} data] == 0} {
00581         clipboard clear -displayof $self.t
00582         clipboard append -displayof $self.t $data
00583         $self delete [$self.t index sel.first] [$self.t index sel.last]
00584         ctext::modified $self 1
00585       }
00586     }
00587 
00588     delete {
00589       #delete n.n ?n.n
00590 
00591       set argsLength [llength $args]
00592 
00593       #first deal with delete n.n
00594       if {$argsLength == 1} {
00595         set deletePos [lindex $args 0]
00596         set prevChar [$self._t get $deletePos]
00597 
00598         $self._t delete $deletePos
00599         set char [$self._t get $deletePos]
00600 
00601         set prevSpace [ctext::findPreviousSpace $self._t $deletePos]
00602         set nextSpace [ctext::findNextSpace $self._t $deletePos]
00603 
00604         set lineStart [$self._t index "$deletePos linestart"]
00605         set lineEnd [$self._t index "$deletePos + 1 chars lineend"]
00606 
00607         #This pattern was used in 3.1.  We may want to investigate using it again
00608         #eventually to reduce flicker.  It caused a bug with some patterns.
00609         #if {[string equal $prevChar "#"] || [string equal $char "#"]} {
00610         #   set removeStart $lineStart
00611         #   set removeEnd $lineEnd
00612         #} else {
00613         #   set removeStart $prevSpace
00614         #   set removeEnd $nextSpace
00615         #}
00616         set removeStart $lineStart
00617         set removeEnd $lineEnd
00618 
00619         foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
00620           if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
00621             $self._t tag remove $tag $removeStart $removeEnd
00622           }
00623         }
00624 
00625         set checkStr "$prevChar[set char]"
00626 
00627         ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $checkStr]
00628         ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
00629         ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00630       } elseif {$argsLength == 2} {
00631         #now deal with delete n.n ?n.n?
00632         set deleteStartPos [lindex $args 0]
00633         set deleteEndPos [lindex $args 1]
00634 
00635         set data [$self._t get $deleteStartPos $deleteEndPos]
00636 
00637         set lineStart [$self._t index "$deleteStartPos linestart"]
00638         set lineEnd [$self._t index "$deleteEndPos + 1 chars lineend"]
00639         eval \$self._t delete $args
00640 
00641         foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
00642           if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
00643             $self._t tag remove $tag $lineStart $lineEnd
00644           }
00645         }
00646 
00647         ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $data]
00648         ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
00649         if {[string first "\n" $data] >= 0} {
00650           ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00651         }
00652       } else {
00653         return -code error "invalid argument(s) sent to $self delete: $args"
00654       }
00655       ctext::modified $self 1
00656     }
00657 
00658     fastdelete {
00659       eval \$self._t delete $args
00660       ctext::modified $self 1
00661       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00662     }
00663 
00664     fastinsert {
00665       eval \$self._t insert $args
00666       ctext::modified $self 1
00667       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00668     }
00669 
00670     highlight {
00671       set lineStart [lindex $args 0]
00672       set lineEnd   [lindex $args 1]
00673       foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
00674         if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
00675           $self._t tag remove $tag $lineStart $lineEnd
00676         }
00677       }
00678       ctext::highlight $self $lineStart $lineEnd
00679       ctext::comments $self $lineStart $lineEnd 1
00680     }
00681 
00682     insert {
00683       if {[llength $args] < 2} {
00684         return -code error "please use at least 2 arguments to $self insert"
00685       }
00686 
00687       set insertPos [$self._t index [lindex $args 0]]
00688       set prevChar [$self._t get "$insertPos - 1 chars"]
00689       set nextChar [$self._t get $insertPos]
00690       if {[lindex $args 0] eq "end"} {
00691         set lineStart [$self._t index "$insertPos-1c linestart"]
00692       } else {
00693         set lineStart [$self._t index "$insertPos linestart"]
00694       }
00695       set prevSpace [ctext::findPreviousSpace $self._t ${insertPos}-1c]
00696       set data [lindex $args 1]
00697       set datalen [string length $data]
00698       eval \$self._t insert $args
00699 
00700       set nextSpace [ctext::findNextSpace $self._t "${insertPos}+${datalen}c"]
00701       set lineEnd [$self._t index "${insertPos}+${datalen}c lineend"]
00702 
00703       if {[$self._t compare $prevSpace < $lineStart]} {
00704         set prevSpace $lineStart
00705       }
00706 
00707       if {[$self._t compare $nextSpace > $lineEnd]} {
00708         set nextSpace $lineEnd
00709       }
00710 
00711       foreach tag [$self._t tag names] {
00712         if {![regexp {^_([lc]Comment|[sdt]String)$} $tag] && ([string index $tag 0] eq "_")} {
00713           $self._t tag remove $tag $prevSpace $nextSpace
00714         }
00715       }
00716 
00717       set REData [$self._t get $prevSpace $nextSpace]
00718 
00719       ctext::commentsAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $REData]
00720       ctext::highlightAfterIdle $self $lineStart $lineEnd
00721 
00722       switch -- $data {
00723         "\}" {
00724           ctext::matchPair $self "\\\{" "\\\}"
00725         }
00726         "\]" {
00727           ctext::matchPair $self "\\\[" "\\\]"
00728         }
00729         "\)" {
00730           ctext::matchPair $self "\\(" "\\)"
00731         }
00732         ">" {
00733           ctext::matchPair $self "\\<" "\\>"
00734         }
00735         "\"" {
00736           ctext::matchQuote $self
00737         }
00738       }
00739       ctext::modified $self 1
00740       ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00741     }
00742 
00743     paste {
00744       tk_textPaste $self
00745       ctext::modified $self 1
00746     }
00747 
00748     peer {
00749       switch [lindex $args 0] {
00750         names {
00751           set names [list]
00752           foreach name [$self._t peer names] {
00753             lappend names [winfo parent $name]
00754           }
00755           return $names
00756         }
00757         default {
00758           return -code error "unknown peer subcommand: [lindex $args 0]"
00759         }
00760       }
00761     }
00762 
00763     edit {
00764       set subCmd [lindex $args 0]
00765       set argsLength [llength $args]
00766 
00767       ctext::getAr $self config ar
00768 
00769       if {"modified" == $subCmd} {
00770         if {$argsLength == 1} {
00771           return $ar(modified)
00772         } elseif {$argsLength == 2} {
00773           set value [lindex $args 1]
00774           set ar(modified) $value
00775         } else {
00776           return -code error "invalid arg(s) to $self edit modified: $args"
00777         }
00778       } else {
00779         #Tk 8.4 has other edit subcommands that I don't want to emulate.
00780         return [uplevel 1 [linsert $args 0 $self._t $cmd]]
00781       }
00782     }
00783 
00784     gutter {
00785       set args [lassign $args subcmd]
00786       switch -glob $subcmd {
00787         create {
00788           set value_list  [lassign $args gutter_name]
00789           set gutter_tags [list]
00790           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00791           foreach {name opts} $value_list {
00792             array set sym_opts $opts
00793             set sym        [expr {[info exists sym_opts(-symbol)] ? $sym_opts(-symbol) : ""}]
00794             set gutter_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:$name:$sym"
00795             if {[info exists sym_opts(-fg)]} {
00796               $self.l tag configure $gutter_tag -foreground $sym_opts(-fg)
00797             }
00798             if {[info exists sym_opts(-onenter)]} {
00799               $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter> "$sym_opts(-onenter) $self"
00800             }
00801             if {[info exists sym_opts(-onleave)]} {
00802               $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave> "$sym_opts(-onleave) $self"
00803             }
00804             if {[info exists sym_opts(-onclick)]} {
00805               $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1> "$sym_opts(-onclick) $self"
00806             }
00807             lappend gutter_tags $gutter_tag
00808             array unset sym_opts
00809           }
00810           lappend ar(gutters) [list $gutter_name $gutter_tags]
00811           ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00812         }
00813         destroy {
00814           set gutter_name    [lindex $args 0]
00815           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00816           if {[set index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
00817             $self._t tag delete {*}[lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1]
00818             set ar(gutters) [lreplace $ar(gutters) $index $index]
00819             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00820           }
00821         }
00822         del* {
00823           lassign $args gutter_name sym_list
00824           set update_needed 0
00825           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00826           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] == -1} {
00827             return -code error "Unable to find gutter name ($gutter_name)"
00828           }
00829           foreach symname $sym_list {
00830             set gutters [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1]
00831             if {[set index [lsearch -glob $gutters "gutter:$gutter_name:$symname:*"]] != -1} {
00832               $self._t tag delete [lindex $gutters $index]
00833               set gutters [lreplace $gutters $index $index]
00834               lset ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1 $gutters
00835               set update_needed 1
00836             }
00837           }
00838           if {$update_needed} {
00839             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00840           }
00841         }
00842         set {
00843           set args [lassign $args gutter_name]
00844           set update_needed 0
00845           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00846           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
00847             foreach {name line_nums} $args {
00848               if {[set gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] gutter:$gutter_name:$name:*]] != -1} {
00849                 foreach line_num $line_nums {
00850                   if {[set curr_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [$self._t tag names $line_num.0] gutter:$gutter_name:*]] ne ""} {
00851                     if {$curr_tag ne $gutter_tag} {
00852                       $self._t tag delete $curr_tag
00853                       $self._t tag add $gutter_tag $line_num.0 $line_num.1
00854                       set update_needed 1
00855                     }
00856                   } else {
00857                     $self._t tag add $gutter_tag $line_num.0 $line_num.1
00858                     set update_needed 1
00859                   }
00860                 }
00861               }
00862             }
00863           }
00864           if {$update_needed} {
00865             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00866           }
00867         }
00868         get {
00869           set gutter_name [lindex $args 0]
00870           set symbols     [list]
00871           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00872           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
00873             foreach gutter_tag [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] {
00874               set lines [list]
00875               foreach {first last} [$self._t tag ranges $gutter_tag] {
00876                 lappend lines [lindex [split $first .] 0]
00877               }
00878               lappend symbols [lindex [split $gutter_tag :] 2] $lines
00879             }
00880           }
00881           return $symbols
00882         }
00883         clear {
00884           set last [lassign $args gutter_name first]
00885           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00886           if {[set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] != -1} {
00887             puts "first: $first, last: $last, gutter_index: $gutter_index"
00888             if {$last eq ""} {
00889               foreach gutter_tag [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] {
00890                 $self._t tag remove $gutter_tag $first.0
00891               }
00892             } else {
00893               foreach gutter_tag [lindex $ar(gutters) $gutter_index 1] {
00894                 $self._t tag remove $gutter_tag $first.0 $last.1
00895               }
00896             }
00897             ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00898           }
00899         }
00900         cget {
00901           lassign $args gutter_name sym_name opt
00902           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00903           if {[set index [lsearch -exact -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] == -1} {
00904             return -code error "Unable to find gutter name ($gutter_name)"
00905           }
00906           if {[set gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1] "gutter:$gutter_name:$sym_name:*"]] == -1} {
00907             return -code error "Unknown symbol ($sym_name) specified"
00908           }
00909           switch $opt {
00910             -symbol  { return [lindex [split $gutter_tag :] 3] }
00911             -fg      { return [$self.l tag cget $gutter_tag -foreground] }
00912             -onenter { return [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter>] 0 end-1] }
00913             -onleave { return [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave>] 0 end-1] }
00914             -onclick { return [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1>] 0 end-1] }
00915             default  {
00916               return -code error "Unknown gutter option ($opt) specified"
00917             }
00918           }
00919         }
00920         conf* {
00921           set args [lassign $args gutter_name]
00922           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00923           if {[set index [lsearch -exact -index 0 $ar(gutters) $gutter_name]] == -1} {
00924             return -code error "Unable to find gutter name ($gutter_name)"
00925           }
00926           if {[llength $args] < 2} {
00927             if {[llength $args] == 0} {
00928               set match_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:*"
00929             } else {
00930               set match_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:[lindex $args 0]:*"
00931             }
00932             foreach gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1] $match_tag] {
00933               lassign [split $gutter_tag :] dummy1 dummy2 symname sym
00934               set symopts [list]
00935               if {$sym ne ""} {
00936                 lappend symopts -symbol $sym
00937               }
00938               if {[set fg [$self.l tag cget $gutter_tag -foreground]] ne ""} {
00939                 lappend symopts -fg $fg
00940               }
00941               if {[set cmd [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter>] 0 end-1]] ne ""} {
00942                 lappend symopts -onenter $cmd
00943               }
00944               if {[set cmd [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave>] 0 end-1]] ne ""} {
00945                 lappend symopts -onleave $cmd
00946               }
00947               if {[set cmd [lrange [$self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1>] 0 end-1]] ne ""} {
00948                 lappend symopts -onclick $cmd
00949               }
00950               lappend gutters $symname $symopts
00951             }
00952             return $gutters
00953           } else {
00954             set args          [lassign $args symname]
00955             set update_needed 0
00956             if {[set gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -glob [lindex $ar(gutters) $index 1] "gutter:$gutter_name:$symname:*"]] == -1} {
00957               return -code error "Unable to find gutter symbol name ($symname)"
00958             }
00959             foreach {opt value} $args {
00960               switch -glob $opt {
00961                 -sym* {
00962                   set ranges [$self._t tag ranges $gutter_tag]
00963                   set opts   [$self._t tag configure $gutter_tag]
00964                   $self._t tag delete $gutter_tag
00965                   set gutter_tag "gutter:$gutter_name:$symname:$value"
00966                   $self._t tag configure $gutter_tag {*}$opts
00967                   $self._t tag add       $gutter_tag {*}$ranges
00968                   set update_needed 1
00969                 }
00970                 -fg {
00971                   $self.l tag configure $gutter_tag -foreground $value
00972                 }
00973                 -onenter {
00974                   $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Enter> $value
00975                 }
00976                 -onleave {
00977                   $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Leave> $value
00978                 }
00979                 -onclick {
00980                   $self.l tag bind $gutter_tag <Button-1> $value
00981                 }
00982                 default {
00983                   return -code error "Unknown gutter option ($opt) specified"
00984                 }
00985               }
00986             }
00987             if {$update_needed} {
00988               ctext::linemapUpdate $self
00989             }
00990           }
00991         }
00992         names {
00993           ctext::getAr $self config ar
00994           set names [list]
00995           foreach gutter $ar(gutters) {
00996             lappend names [lindex $gutter 0]
00997           }
00998           return $names
00999         }
01000       }
01001     }
01002 
01003     default {
01004       return [uplevel 1 [linsert $args 0 $self._t $cmd]]
01005     }
01006 
01007   }
01008 
01009 }
01010 
01011 proc ctext::tag:blink {win count {afterTriggered 0}} {
01012   if {$count & 1} {
01013     $win tag configure __ctext_blink \
01014     -foreground [$win cget -bg] -background [$win cget -fg]
01015   } else {
01016     $win tag configure __ctext_blink \
01017     -foreground [$win cget -fg] -background [$win cget -bg]
01018   }
01019 
01020   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01021   if {$afterTriggered} {
01022     set configAr(blinkAfterId) ""
01023   }
01024 
01025   if {$count == 4} {
01026     $win tag delete __ctext_blink 1.0 end
01027     return
01028   }
01029 
01030   incr count
01031   if {"" eq $configAr(blinkAfterId)} {
01032     set configAr(blinkAfterId) [after 50 \
01033     [list ctext::tag:blink $win $count [set afterTriggered 1]]]
01034   }
01035 }
01036 
01037 proc ctext::matchPair {win str1 str2} {
01038 
01039   if {[isEscaped $win "insert-1c"]} {
01040     return
01041   }
01042 
01043   set searchRE "[set str1]|[set str2]"
01044   set count 1
01045 
01046   set pos [$win index "insert - 1 chars"]
01047   set endPair $pos
01048   set lastFound ""
01049   while 1 {
01050     set found [$win search -backwards -regexp $searchRE $pos]
01051 
01052     if {$found == "" || [$win compare $found > $pos]} {
01053       return
01054     }
01055 
01056     if {$lastFound != "" && [$win compare $found == $lastFound]} {
01057       #The search wrapped and found the previous search
01058       return
01059     }
01060 
01061     set lastFound $found
01062     set char [$win get $found]
01063     set prevChar [$win get "$found - 1 chars"]
01064     set pos $found
01065 
01066     if {[isEscaped $win $found]} {
01067       continue
01068     } elseif {[string equal $char [subst $str2]]} {
01069       incr count
01070     } elseif {[string equal $char [subst $str1]]} {
01071       incr count -1
01072       if {$count == 0} {
01073         set startPair $found
01074         break
01075       }
01076     } else {
01077       # This shouldn't happen.  I may in the future make it
01078       # return -code error
01079       puts stderr "ctext seems to have encountered a bug in ctext::matchPair"
01080       return
01081     }
01082   }
01083 
01084   $win tag add __ctext_blink $startPair
01085   $win tag add __ctext_blink $endPair
01086   ctext::tag:blink $win 0
01087 }
01088 
01089 proc ctext::matchQuote {win} {
01090   set endQuote [$win index insert]
01091   set start [$win index "insert - 1 chars"]
01092 
01093   # The quote really isn't the end if it is escaped or if the previous
01094   # character had a string tag associated with it.
01095   if {[isEscaped $win $start] || ([lsearch [$win tag names $start] "_dString"] == -1)} {
01096     return
01097   }
01098 
01099   set lastFound ""
01100   while 1 {
01101     set startQuote [$win search -backwards \" $start]
01102     if {$startQuote == "" || [$win compare $startQuote > $start]} {
01103       #The search found nothing or it wrapped.
01104       return
01105     }
01106 
01107     if {$lastFound != "" && [$win compare $lastFound == $startQuote]} {
01108       #We found the character we found before, so it wrapped.
01109       return
01110     }
01111     set lastFound $startQuote
01112     set start [$win index "$startQuote - 1 chars"]
01113     set prevChar [$win get $start]
01114 
01115     if {[isEscaped $win $start]} {
01116       continue
01117     }
01118     break
01119   }
01120 
01121   if {[$win compare $endQuote == $startQuote]} {
01122     #probably just \"
01123     return
01124   }
01125 
01126   $win tag add __ctext_blink $startQuote $endQuote
01127   ctext::tag:blink $win 0
01128 }
01129 
01130 proc ctext::setBlockCommentPatterns {win patterns {color "khaki"}} {
01131   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01132   set configAr(block_comment_patterns) $patterns
01133   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
01134     $win tag configure _cComment -foreground $color
01135   } else {
01136     catch { $win tag delete _cComment }
01137   }
01138   setCommentRE $win
01139 }
01140 
01141 proc ctext::setLineCommentPatterns {win patterns {color "khaki"}} {
01142   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01143   set configAr(line_comment_patterns) $patterns
01144   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
01145     $win tag configure _lComment -foreground $color
01146   } else {
01147     catch { $win tag delete _lComment }
01148   }
01149   setCommentRE $win
01150 }
01151 
01152 proc ctext::setStringPatterns {win patterns {color "green"}} {
01153   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01154   set configAr(string_patterns) $patterns
01155   if {[llength $patterns] > 0} {
01156     $win tag configure _sString -foreground $color
01157     $win tag configure _dString -foreground $color
01158     $win tag configure _tString -foreground $color
01159   } else {
01160     catch { $win tag delete _sString }
01161     catch { $win tag delete _dString }
01162     catch { $win tag delete _tString }
01163   }
01164   setCommentRE $win
01165 }
01166 
01167 proc ctext::comments {win start end blocks {afterTriggered 0}} {
01168 
01169   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01170 
01171   if {$afterTriggered} {
01172     set configAr(commentsAfterId) ""
01173   }
01174 
01175   set strings        [llength $configAr(string_patterns)]
01176   set block_comments [llength $configAr(block_comment_patterns)]
01177   set line_comments  [llength $configAr(line_comment_patterns)]
01178 
01179   if {$blocks && [expr ($strings + $block_comments + $line_comments) > 0]} {
01180 
01181     set dStr ""
01182     set sStr ""
01183     set tStr ""
01184     set lCom ""
01185     set cCom ""
01186 
01187     # Update the indices based on previous text
01188     # commentsGetPrevious $win $start cCom lCom sStr dStr tStr
01189 
01190     # Parse the new text between start and end
01191     # commentsParse $win $start end cCom lCom sStr dStr tStr
01192     commentsParse $win 1.0 end cCom lCom sStr dStr tStr
01193 
01194   # Otherwise, look for just the single line comments
01195   } elseif {$line_comments > 0} {
01196 
01197     set commentRE "([join $configAr(line_comment_patterns) |])"
01198     append commentRE {[^\n\r]*}
01199 
01200     set lcomment [list]
01201 
01202     # Handle single line comments in the given range
01203     set i 0
01204     foreach index [$win search -all -count lengths -regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $commentRE $start $end] {
01205       if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01206         lappend lcomment $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"
01207       }
01208       incr i
01209     }
01210 
01211     # If we need to raise the lComment, do it now
01212     if {[llength $lcomment] > 0 } {
01213       $win tag add _lComment {*}$lcomment
01214       $win tag raise _lComment
01215     }
01216 
01217   }
01218 
01219 }
01220 
01221 proc ctext::commentsGetPrevious {win index pcCom plCom psStr pdStr ptStr} {
01222 
01223   upvar $pcCom cCom
01224   upvar $plCom lCom
01225   upvar $psStr sStr
01226   upvar $pdStr dStr
01227   upvar $ptStr tStr
01228 
01229   # Figure out if we are in a comment or string currently
01230   if {[set prev_index [$win index "$index-1c"]] ne [$win index $index]} {
01231     foreach tag [$win tag names $prev_index] {
01232       switch $tag {
01233         "_cComment" { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] cCom }
01234         "_lComment" { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] lCom }
01235         "_sString"  { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] sStr }
01236         "_dString"  { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] dStr }
01237         "_tString"  { lassign [$win tag prevrange $tag $index] tStr }
01238       }
01239     }
01240   }
01241 
01242 }
01243 
01244 proc ctext::commentsParse {win start end pcCom plCom psStr pdStr ptStr} {
01245 
01246   set parse_time [time {
01247 
01248   upvar $pcCom cCom
01249   upvar $plCom lCom
01250   upvar $psStr sStr
01251   upvar $pdStr dStr
01252   upvar $ptStr tStr
01253 
01254   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01255 
01256   set lcomment ""
01257   set ccomment ""
01258   set sstring  ""
01259   set dstring  ""
01260   set tstring  ""
01261 
01262   set search_time [time {
01263   set indices [$win search -all -overlap -count lengths -regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $configAr(comment_re) $start $end]
01264   }]
01265   set num_indices [llength $indices]
01266   set match_time [time {
01267   for {set i 0} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01268 
01269     set index [lindex $indices $i]
01270     set str   [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
01271 
01272     # Only handle the comment if it is not escaped
01273     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01274 
01275       # Found a double-quote character
01276       if {$str == "\""} {
01277         commentsParseDStringEnd $win $index indices $num_indices lengths i dstring
01278 
01279       # Found a single-quote character
01280       } elseif {$str == "'"} {
01281         commentsParseSStringEnd $win $index indices $num_indices lengths i sstring
01282 
01283       # Found a triple-double-quote character string
01284       } elseif {$str == "\"\"\""} {
01285         commentsParseTStringEnd $win $index indices $num_indices lengths i tstring
01286 
01287       # Found a single line comment
01288       } elseif {($configAr(lcomment_re) ne "") && [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $configAr(lcomment_re) $str]} {
01289         commentsParseLCommentEnd $win $index indices $num_indices i lcomment
01290 
01291       # Found a starting block comment string
01292       } elseif {($configAr(bcomment_re) ne "") && [regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -- $configAr(bcomment_re) $str]} {
01293         commentsParseCCommentEnd $win $index indices $num_indices $configAr(re_opts) $configAr(ecomment_re) lengths i ccomment
01294       }
01295 
01296     }
01297 
01298   }
01299   }]
01300 
01301   # Delete old, add new and re-raise tags
01302   set add_time [time {
01303   $win tag remove _lComment $start $end
01304   if {[llength $lcomment] > 0} {
01305     $win tag add _lComment {*}$lcomment
01306     $win tag raise _lComment
01307   }
01308   $win tag remove _cComment $start $end
01309   if {[llength $ccomment] > 0} {
01310     $win tag add _cComment {*}$ccomment
01311     $win tag raise _cComment
01312   }
01313   $win tag remove _sString  $start $end
01314   if {[llength $sstring] > 0} {
01315     $win tag add _sString {*}$sstring
01316     $win tag raise _sString
01317   }
01318   $win tag remove _dString  $start $end
01319   if {[llength $dstring] > 0} {
01320     $win tag add _dString {*}$dstring
01321     $win tag raise _dString
01322   }
01323   $win tag remove _tString  $start $end
01324   if {[llength $tstring] > 0} {
01325     $win tag add _tString {*}$tstring
01326     $win tag raise _tString
01327   }
01328   }]
01329 
01330   }]
01331 
01332   # puts "search_time: $search_time, match_time: $match_time, add_time: $add_time, parse_time: $parse_time"
01333 
01334 }
01335 
01336 proc ctext::commentsParseSStringEnd {win index pindices num_indices plengths pi psstring} {
01337 
01338   upvar $pindices indices
01339   upvar $plengths lengths
01340   upvar $pi       i
01341   upvar $psstring sstring
01342 
01343   lappend sstring $index end
01344 
01345   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01346     set index [lindex $indices $i]
01347     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01348       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
01349       if {$str == "'"} {
01350         lset sstring end "$index+1c"
01351         break
01352       }
01353     }
01354   }
01355 
01356 }
01357 
01358 proc ctext::commentsParseDStringEnd {win index pindices num_indices plengths pi pdstring} {
01359 
01360   upvar $pindices indices
01361   upvar $plengths lengths
01362   upvar $pi       i
01363   upvar $pdstring dstring
01364 
01365   lappend dstring $index end
01366 
01367   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01368     set index [lindex $indices $i]
01369     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01370       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
01371       if {$str == "\""} {
01372         lset dstring end "$index+1c"
01373         break
01374       }
01375     }
01376   }
01377 
01378 }
01379 
01380 proc ctext::commentsParseTStringEnd {win index pindices num_indices plengths pi ptstring} {
01381 
01382   upvar $pindices indices
01383   upvar $plengths lengths
01384   upvar $pi       i
01385   upvar $ptstring tstring
01386 
01387   lappend tstring $index end
01388 
01389   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01390     set index [lindex $indices $i]
01391     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01392       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
01393       if {$str == "\"\"\""} {
01394         lset tstring end "$index+3c"
01395         break
01396       }
01397     }
01398   }
01399 
01400 }
01401 
01402 proc ctext::commentsParseLCommentEnd {win index pindices num_indices pi plcomment} {
01403 
01404   upvar $pindices  indices
01405   upvar $pi        i
01406   upvar $plcomment lcomment
01407 
01408   lappend lcomment $index "$index lineend"
01409 
01410   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01411     set nxt_index [lindex $indices $i]
01412     if {[$win compare $nxt_index > "$index lineend"]} {
01413       incr i -1
01414       break
01415     }
01416   }
01417 
01418 }
01419 
01420 proc ctext::commentsParseCCommentEnd {win index pindices num_indices re_opts ecomment_re plengths pi pccomment} {
01421 
01422   upvar $pindices  indices
01423   upvar $plengths  lengths
01424   upvar $pi        i
01425   upvar $pccomment ccomment
01426 
01427   lappend ccomment $index end
01428 
01429   for {incr i} {$i < $num_indices} {incr i} {
01430     set index [lindex $indices $i]
01431     if {![isEscaped $win $index]} {
01432       set str [$win get $index "$index+[lindex $lengths $i]c"]
01433       if {[regexp {*}$re_opts -- $ecomment_re $str]} {
01434         lset ccomment end "$index+[string length $str]c"
01435         break
01436       }
01437     }
01438   }
01439 
01440 }

01442 proc ctext::add_font_opt {win class modifiers popts} {
01443   
01444   upvar $popts opts
01445 
01446   if {[llength $modifiers] > 0} {
01447     
01448     array set font_opts [font configure [$win cget -font]]
01449 
01450     foreach modifier $modifiers {
01451       switch $modifier {
01452         "bold"       { set font_opts(-weight)     "bold" }
01453         "italics"    { set font_opts(-slant)      "italic" }
01454         "underline"  { set font_opts(-underline)  1 }
01455         "overstrike" { set font_opts(-overstrike) 1 }
01456         "large"      { set font_opts(-size)       [expr $font_opts(-size) + 2] }
01457       }
01458     }
01459 
01460     lappend opts -font [font create font$win$class {*}[array get font_opts]]
01461     
01462   }
01463   
01464 }

01466 proc ctext::addHighlightClass {win class color modifiers keywords} {
01467   set ref [ctext::getAr $win highlight ar]
01468 
01469   set opts [expr {($color eq "") ? [list] : [list -foreground $color]}]
01470   add_font_opt $win $class $modifiers opts
01471   
01472   foreach word $keywords {
01473     set ar($word) [list _$class $opts [list]]
01474   }
01475   $win tag configure _$class
01476 
01477   ctext::getAr $win classes classesAr
01478   set classesAr(_$class) [list $ref $keywords]
01479 }

01510 proc ctext::addSearchClass {win class fgcolor bgcolor modifiers str} {
01511   set ref [ctext::getAr $win highlight ar]
01512   
01513   set opts [list -foreground $fgcolor -background $bgcolor]
01514   add_font_opt $win $class $modifiers opts
01515   
01516   set ar(_$class) [list $str $opts]
01517   
01518   ctext::getAr $win classes classesAr
01519   set classesAr(_$class) [list $ref _$class]
01520   
01521   # Perform the search
01522   set i 0
01523   foreach res [$win._t search -count lengths -all -- $str 1.0 end] {
01524     set wordEnd [$win._t index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
01525     $win._t tag add _$class $res $wordEnd
01526     incr i
01527   }
01528   $win._t tag configure _$class -foreground $fgcolor -background $bgcolor
01529   
01530 }

01532 proc ctext::addSearchClassForRegexp {win class fgcolor bgcolor modifiers re {re_opts ""}} {
01533   set ref [ctext::getAr $win highlightRegexp ar]
01534

01536   add_font_opt $win $class $modifiers opts
01537

01541   set classesAr(_$class) [list $ref _$class]
01542 
01543   # Perform the search
01544   set i 0
01545   foreach res [$win._t search -count lengths -regexp -all {*}$re_opts -- $re 1.0 end] {
01546     set wordEnd [$win._t index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
01547     $win._t tag add _$class $res $wordEnd
01548     incr i
01549   }
01550   $win._t tag configure _$class -foreground $fgcolor -background $bgcolor
01551

01554 proc ctext::deleteHighlightClass {win classToDelete} {
01555   ctext::getAr $win classes classesAr
01556 
01557   if {![info exists classesAr(_$classToDelete)]} {
01558     return -code error "$classToDelete doesn't exist"
01559   }
01560 
01561   foreach {ref keyList} [set classesAr(_$classToDelete)] {
01562     upvar #0 $ref refAr
01563     foreach key $keyList {
01564       if {![info exists refAr($key)]} {
01565         continue
01566       }
01567       unset refAr($key)
01568     }
01569   }
01570   unset classesAr(_$classToDelete)
01571   $win tag delete _$classToDelete 1.0 end
01572 }

01574 proc ctext::getHighlightClasses win {
01575   ctext::getAr $win classes classesAr
01576 
01577   set classes [list]
01578   foreach class [array names classesAr] {
01579     lappend classes [string range $class 1 end]
01580   }
01581 
01582   return $classes
01583 }

01585 proc ctext::findNextChar {win index char} {
01586   set i [$win index "$index + 1 chars"]
01587   set lineend [$win index "$i lineend"]
01588   while 1 {
01589     set ch [$win get $i]
01590     if {[$win compare $i >= $lineend]} {
01591       return ""
01592     }
01593     if {$ch == $char} {
01594       return $i
01595     }
01596     set i [$win index "$i + 1 chars"]
01597   }
01598 }
01599 
01600 proc ctext::findNextSpace {win index} {
01601   set i [$win index $index]
01602   set lineStart [$win index "$i linestart"]
01603   set lineEnd [$win index "$i lineend"]
01604   #Sometimes the lineend fails (I don't know why), so add 1 and try again.
01605   if {[$win compare $lineEnd == $lineStart]} {
01606     set lineEnd [$win index "$i + 1 chars lineend"]
01607   }
01608 
01609   while {1} {
01610     set ch [$win get $i]
01611 
01612     if {[$win compare $i >= $lineEnd]} {
01613       set i $lineEnd
01614       break
01615     }
01616 
01617     if {[string is space $ch]} {
01618       break
01619     }
01620     set i [$win index "$i + 1 chars"]
01621   }
01622   return $i
01623 }
01624 
01625 proc ctext::findPreviousSpace {win index} {
01626   set i [$win index $index]
01627   set lineStart [$win index "$i linestart"]
01628   while {1} {
01629     set ch [$win get $i]
01630 
01631     if {[$win compare $i <= $lineStart]} {
01632       set i $lineStart
01633       break
01634     }
01635 
01636     if {[string is space $ch]} {
01637       break
01638     }
01639 
01640     set i [$win index "$i - 1 chars"]
01641   }
01642   return $i
01643 }

01645 proc ctext::clearHighlightClasses {win} {
01646   ctext::getAr $win highlight ar
01647   array unset ar
01648 
01649   ctext::getAr $win highlightRegexp ar
01650   array unset ar
01651 
01652   ctext::getAr $win highlightCharStart ar
01653   array unset ar
01654 
01655   ctext::getAr $win classes ar
01656   array unset ar
01657 
01658   # Delete the associated tags
01659   if {[winfo exists $win]} {
01660     foreach tag [$win tag names] {
01661       if {[string index $tag 0] eq "_"} {
01662         $win tag delete $tag
01663       }
01664     }
01665   }
01666 }

01668 #This is a proc designed to be overwritten by the user.
01669 #It can be used to update a cursor or animation while
01670 #the text is being highlighted.
01671 proc ctext::update {win} {
01672 
01673 }
01674 
01675 proc ctext::doHighlight {win} {
01676 
01677   variable REs
01678 
01679   if {![winfo exists $win]} {
01680     return
01681   }
01682 
01683   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01684 
01685   if {!$configAr(-highlight)} {
01686     return
01687   }
01688 
01689   # Get the highlights and delete the tag
01690   set linesChanged [$win tag ranges lineChanged]
01691   $win tag delete lineChanged
01692 
01693   ctext::getAr $win highlight highlightAr
01694   ctext::getAr $win highlightRegexp highlightRegexpAr
01695   ctext::getAr $win highlightCharStart highlightCharStartAr
01696 
01697   set twin "$win._t"
01698 
01699   set total_keywords 0
01700   set total_regexps  0
01701 
01702   foreach {start end} $linesChanged {
01703 
01704     append end " lineend"
01705 
01706     set keywords [time {
01707     set i 0
01708     foreach res [$twin search -count lengths -regexp {*}$configAr(re_opts) -all -- $REs(words) $start $end] {
01709       set wordEnd [$twin index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
01710       set word    [$twin get $res $wordEnd]
01711       if {[info exists highlightAr($word)]} {
01712         lassign $highlightAr($word) tagClass colors
01713         $twin tag add $tagClass $res $wordEnd
01714         set tagged($tagClass) $colors
01715       } elseif {[info exists highlightCharStartAr([set firstOfWord [string index $word 0]])]} {
01716         lassign $highlightCharStartAr($firstOfWord) tagClass colors
01717         $twin tag add $tagClass $res $wordEnd
01718         set tagged($tagClass) $colors
01719       }
01720       incr i
01721     }
01722     }]
01723 
01724     set regexps [time {
01725     foreach {tagClass tagInfo} [array get highlightRegexpAr] {
01726       lassign $tagInfo re colors re_opts
01727       if {$re_opts eq ""} {
01728         set re_opts $configAr(re_opts)
01729       }
01730       set i 0
01731       foreach res [$twin search -count lengths -regexp {*}$re_opts -all -- $re $start $end] {
01732         set wordEnd [$twin index "$res + [lindex $lengths $i] chars"]
01733         $twin tag add $tagClass $res $wordEnd
01734         set tagged($tagClass) $colors
01735         incr i
01736       }
01737     }
01738     }]
01739 
01740     incr total_keywords [lindex $keywords 0]
01741     incr total_regexps  [lindex $regexps 0]
01742 
01743   }
01744 
01745   # puts "total_keywords: $total_keywords, total_regexps: $total_regexps"
01746 
01747   # Finally, colorize the tags
01748   foreach {tagClass colors} [array get tagged] {
01749     $twin tag configure $tagClass {*}$colors
01750   }
01751 
01752 }
01753 
01754 proc ctext::linemapToggleMark {win y} {
01755 
01756   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01757 
01758   if {!$configAr(-linemap_markable)} {
01759     return
01760   }
01761 
01762   ctext::getAr $win linemap linemapAr
01763 
01764   set lline [lindex [split [set lmarkChar [$win.l index @0,$y]] .] 0]
01765   set tline [lindex [split [set tmarkChar [$win.t index @0,$y]] .] 0]
01766 
01767   if {[set lmark [lsearch -inline -glob [$win.t tag names $tline.0] lmark*]] ne ""} {
01768     #It's already marked, so unmark it.
01769     $win.l tag remove lmark $lline.0 $lline.end
01770     $win.t tag delete $lmark
01771     ctext::linemapUpdate $win
01772     set type unmarked
01773   } else {
01774     set lmark "lmark[incr linemapAr(id)]"
01775     #This means that the line isn't toggled, so toggle it.
01776     $win.t tag add $lmark $tmarkChar [$win.t index "$tmarkChar lineend"]
01777     $win.l tag add lmark $lmarkChar [$win.l index "$lmarkChar lineend"]
01778     $win.l tag configure lmark -foreground $configAr(-linemap_select_fg) \
01779       -background $configAr(-linemap_select_bg)
01780     set type marked
01781   }
01782 
01783   if {[string length $configAr(-linemap_mark_command)]} {
01784     uplevel #0 [linsert $configAr(-linemap_mark_command) end $win $type $lmark]
01785   }
01786 
01787 }
01788 
01789 proc ctext::linemapSetMark {win line} {
01790 
01791   if {[lsearch -inline -glob [$win.t tag names $line.0] lmark*] eq ""} {
01792     ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01793     ctext::getAr $win linemap linemapAr
01794     set lmark "lmark[incr linemapAr(id)]"
01795     $win.t tag add $lmark $line.0 [$win.t index "$line.0 lineend"]
01796     $win.l tag add lmark $line.0 [$win.l index "$line.0 lineend"]
01797     $win.l tag configure lmark -foreground $configAr(-linemap_select_fg) \
01798       -background $configAr(-linemap_select_bg)
01799   }
01800 
01801 }
01802 
01803 proc ctext::linemapClearMark {win line} {
01804 
01805   if {[set lmark [lsearch -inline -glob [$win.t tag names $line.0] lmark*]] ne ""} {
01806     $win.t tag delete $lmark
01807     $win.l tag remove lmark $line.0 $line.end
01808     ctext::linemapUpdate $win
01809   }
01810 
01811 }
01812 
01813 #args is here because -yscrollcommand may call it
01814 proc ctext::linemapUpdate {win args} {
01815 
01816   if {[winfo exists $win.l] != 1} {
01817     return
01818   }
01819 
01820   ctext::getAr $win config configAr
01821 
01822   set pixel 0
01823   set lastLine {}
01824   set lineList [list]
01825   set fontMetrics [font metrics [$win._t cget -font]]
01826   set incrBy [expr {1 + ([lindex $fontMetrics 5] / 2)}]
01827 
01828   while {$pixel < [winfo height $win.l]} {
01829     set idx [$win._t index @0,$pixel]
01830     if {$idx != $lastLine} {
01831       set line [lindex [split $idx .] 0]
01832       set lastLine $idx
01833       lappend lineList $line
01834     }
01835     incr pixel $incrBy
01836   }
01837 
01838   $win.l delete 1.0 end
01839   set lastLine {}
01840   set gutter_width  [expr ([llength $configAr(gutters)] > 0) ? ([llength $configAr(gutters)] + 1) : 0]
01841   set gutter_string [string repeat " " $gutter_width]
01842   foreach line $lineList {
01843     if {$line == $lastLine} {
01844       $win.l insert end "$gutter_string\n"
01845     } else {
01846       if {[lsearch -glob [$win.t tag names $line.0] lmark*] != -1} {
01847         $win.l insert end "$gutter_string$line\n" lmark
01848       } else {
01849         $win.l insert end "$gutter_string$line\n"
01850       }
01851     }
01852     foreach gutter_tag [lsearch -inline -all -glob [$win._t tag names $line.0] gutter:*] {
01853       lassign [split $gutter_tag :] dummy gutter_name gutter_symname gutter_sym
01854       set gutter_index [lsearch -index 0 $configAr(gutters) $gutter_name]
01855       if {$gutter_sym eq ""} {
01856         set gutter_sym " "
01857       }
01858       $win.l replace $line.$gutter_index $line.[expr $gutter_index + 1] $gutter_sym $gutter_tag
01859     }
01860     set lastLine $line
01861   }
01862   if {[llength $lineList] > 0} {
01863     linemapUpdateOffset $win $lineList
01864   }
01865   set lwidth [string length [lindex [split [$win._t index end-1c] .] 0]]
01866   $win.l configure -width [expr (($configAr(-linemap_minwidth) > $lwidth) ? $configAr(-linemap_minwidth) : $lwidth) + $gutter_width]
01867 }
01868 
01869 # Starting with Tk 8.5 the text widget allows smooth scrolling; this
01870 # code calculates the offset for the line numbering text widget and
01871 # scrolls by the specified amount of pixels
01872 
01873 if {![catch {
01874   package require Tk 8.5
01875 }]} {
01876   proc ctext::linemapUpdateOffset {win lineList} {
01877     # reset view for line numbering widget
01878     $win.l yview 0.0
01879 
01880     # find the first line that is visible and calculate the
01881     # corresponding line in the line numbers widget
01882     set lline 1
01883     foreach line $lineList {
01884       set tystart [lindex [$win.t bbox $line.0] 1]
01885       if {$tystart != ""} {
01886         break
01887       }
01888       incr lline
01889     }
01890 
01891     # return in case the line numbers text widget is not up to
01892     # date
01893     if {[catch {
01894       set lystart [lindex [$win.l bbox $lline.0] 1]
01895     }]} {
01896       return
01897     }
01898 
01899     # return in case the bbox for any of the lines returned an
01900     # empty value
01901     if {($tystart == "") || ($lystart == "")} {
01902       return
01903     }
01904 
01905     # calculate the offset and then scroll by specified number of
01906     # pixels
01907     set offset [expr {$lystart - $tystart}]
01908     $win.l yview scroll $offset pixels
01909   }
01910 }  else  {
01911   # Do not try to perform smooth scrolling if Tk is 8.4 or less.
01912   proc ctext::linemapUpdateOffset {args} {}
01913 }
01914 
01915 proc ctext::modified {win value} {
01916   ctext::getAr $win config ar
01917   set ar(modified) $value
01918   event generate $win <<Modified>>
01919   return $value
01920 }
